text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e6b5324e3a3d354363f3c48e784c42ce3e77453f|patch 8.2.1110: Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arg…>
patch 8.2.1110: Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arguments

Problem:    Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arguments.
Solution:   Pass "evalarg" to get_func_tv().  Fix seeing double quoted string
            as comment.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1110: Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arg… · vim/vim@e6b5324
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1110: Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arg… · vim/vim@e6b5324
attachments.text: …uments Problem: Vim9: line continuation does not work in function arguments. Solution: Pass "evalarg" to get_func_tv(). Fix seeing double quoted string as comment.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a78e6df17033223ebdf499f2b02b2538601c52d|patch 8.2.1111: inconsistent naming of get_list_tv() and eval_dict()>
patch 8.2.1111: inconsistent naming of get_list_tv() and eval_dict()

Problem:    Inconsistent naming of get_list_tv() and eval_dict().
Solution:   Rename get_list_tv() to eval_list().  Similarly for eval_number(),
            eval_string(), eval_lit_string() and a few others.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1111: inconsistent naming of get_list_tv() and eval_dict() · vim/vim@9a78e6d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1111: inconsistent naming of get_list_tv() and eval_dict() · vim/vim@9a78e6d

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5f195938d4d489aa288bdb54ee6112a34aed1df9|patch 8.2.1112: Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call>
patch 8.2.1112: Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call

Problem:    Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call.
Solution:   Handle line continuation in expression before method call.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1112: Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call · vim/vim@5f19593
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1112: Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call · vim/vim@5f19593
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no line continuation allowed in method call. Solution: Handle line continuation in expression before method call.
